name: RandomTriviaQuestions
0:
”Alexa, open random trivia questions”
”Alexa, start random trivia questions”
”Alexa, launch random trivia questions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random trivia questions
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Random Trivia Question" is an Alexa skill designed to test your general knowledge by playing a quiz game.

Users are asked general trivia questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no".

Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.

The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.

In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.

Try the multiplayer mode, challenge your family and friends and find out who will be the winner!!! 

Have fun!
